mapper.insert: insert into loan_history(user_id, user_email, book_title, book_author, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher, return_period) values (#{user_id}, #{user_email}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_isbn}, #{book_cover}, #{book_pubDate}, #{book_publisher}, adddate(current_timestamp, 14))
mapper.select: select count(*) from loan_history where book_isbn = #{book_isbn} and return_status = false
select count(*) as 'total_count', book_title, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher, book_author from loan_history group by book_isbn order by total_count desc limit 10;
